briefdescription.para: A function to convert a 2D Kokkos view into a ginkgo multivector structure.

parameterdescription.para: A Ginkgo executor that has access to the Kokkos::View memory space
A 2-D Kokkos::View with unit stride in the second dimension

simplesect.para: A Ginkgo Multivector view over the Kokkos::View data

memberdef.argsstring: (int const batch_size, double const tol, std::shared_ptr< const gko::Executor > gko_exec, std::shared_ptr< const gko::batch::log::BatchConvergence< double > > logger)
memberdef.name: check_conv

briefdescription.para: A function for checking convergence. It loops over the batch and checks the if residual is lower or equal to the prescribed tolerance.

parameterdescription.para: the size of the batch , ie number of linears problems.
The tolerancy on residual norm above which a non-convergency is reported.
Ginkgo executor, refers to the execution space.
Ginkgo convergence object which stores iterations number and residual for the whole batch.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::fstream &log_file, int const batch_index, int const num_iterations, double const implicit_res_norm, double const true_res_norm, double const b_norm, double const tol)
memberdef.name: write_log

briefdescription.para: A helper to write the log corresponding to a single batch.

parameterdescription.para: The stream of the log file.
The index of the batch.
The number of iterations the iterative solver performed for this batch.
The implicit residual norm at the end of the solver call (evaluated by the Ginkgo solver).
The true residual norm at the end of the solver call (re-computed by hand).
The norm of the right-hand side.
The tolerancy on residual norm above which a non-convergency is reported.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::fstream &log_file, int const batch_index, std::unique_ptr< sparse_type > matrix, Kokkos::View< double *, Kokkos::LayoutRight, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace > const x_view, Kokkos::View< double *, Kokkos::LayoutRight, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace > const b_view, std::shared_ptr< const gko::log::Convergence< double > > logger, double const tol)
memberdef.name: save_logger

briefdescription.para: A function to save convergence data using the logger.

parameterdescription.para: The file in which the logs will be saved.
The index of the relevant matrix in the batch of matrices.
Batch of matrices.
2d Kokkos view containing the batch of computed solutions.
2d Kokkos view containing the batch of rhs.
Ginkgo logger which stores residual and numbers of iterations for the whole batch.
tolerance

memberdef.argsstring: (std::fstream &log_file, std::shared_ptr< batch_sparse_type > batch_matrix, Kokkos::View< double **, Kokkos::LayoutRight, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace > const x_view, Kokkos::View< double **, Kokkos::LayoutRight, Kokkos::DefaultExecutionSpace > const b_view, std::shared_ptr< const gko::batch::log::BatchConvergence< double > > logger, double const tol)
memberdef.name: save_logger

briefdescription.para: A function to save convergence data using the logger.

parameterdescription.para: The file in which the logs will be saved.
Batch of matrices.
2d Kokkos view containing the batch of computed solutions.
2d Kokkos view containing the batch of rhs.
